ability.name: Applied Chronometrics
ability.flavor: Time slows down around you. Your heartbeat is the only gauge of the extra moments you've gained.

metadata.flavor: Time slows down around you. Your heartbeat is the only gauge of the extra moments you've gained.

effect.t1: You target two creatures, one of which can be you.
effect.t2: You target three creatures, one of which can be you.
effect.t3: You target four creatures, one of which can be you.

effects.effect: Until the start of your next turn, each target gains a +5 bonus to speed, they can't be made dazed, and they can use an additional maneuver on their turn. If a target is already dazed, that condition ends for them.
Your speed is halved until the end of the encounter.
